title: Ali Khamenei reappears for Islamic Republic's 47th anniversary
desc: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei made a public appearance to pray at the tomb of former Iranian Supreme Leader Ruhollah Khomeini, according to a post on his official X account.

title: Roberto De Zerbi clarifies Marseille future after reportedly handing in resignation following Champions League exit
desc: Roberto De Zerbi has clarified his Marseille future after reports surfaced he had resigned following the French side's Champions League exit. The Ligue 1 outfit were dumped out of the competition in midweek after a 3-0 loss at Club Brugge, coupled with Benfica's dramatic 4-2 win over Real Madrid. After speculation mounted the Italian had stepped down from his role, De Zerbi has now set the record straight.

title: Kathleen (Cattie) Martin (née McAteer), Coolback, Kindrum, Fanad, Co. Donegal
desc: The death has taken place of Kathleen (Cattie) Martin (née McAteer), Coolback, Kindrum, Fanad, Co. Donegal, peacefully at home surrounded by her loving family. Predeceased by her husband Joe and her daughters Roisin and Mary. Deeply regretted by her children Margaret, Johnny, Paula, Gerard, Enda and Karen. Sadly missed by her sisters Nora Cronin (Letterkenny) […]

title: Catherine O'Hara: Pedro Pascal and Meryl Streep lead tributes
desc: The Canadian comedic actress died in Los Angeles on Friday at the age of 71 following a brief illness.

title: Ruto to Launch Political School for UDA Using Communist Party of China Framework
desc: UDA Party seeks to emulate the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), which has been in power for 76 years and has established control over mainland China through a leadership school.

title: The Architect of Credit: Zaar Kingdom Celebrates Dogara’s Strategic Appointment to the NCGC
desc: The Zaar Kingdom has erupted in celebration following President Bola Ahmed Tinubu’s appointment of the former Speaker of the House of Representatives, Rt. Hon. Yakubu Dogara, as the Board Chairman of the National Credit Guarantee Company Limited (NCGC). In an official communiqué from the Gung Zaar Council, the appointment was hailed as a "divine testament"

title: It's all in the mind for Wei Chong-Kai Wun, says Herry
desc: PETALING JAYA: For men's doubles shuttlers Man Wei Chong-Tee Kai Wun, it is a battle of the mind.
